name: EPIC 206215704
scenarioDescription:
The EPIC 206215704 Exoplanetary System


Overview

EPIC 206215704 is a star with 0.41 times the mass of the Sun, and 0.37 times its radius. It is located NaN light years away from the solar system.

EPIC 206215704 is known to have undefined exoplanets in orbit around it.


Exoplanets in the EPIC 206215704 system


EPIC 206215704 b

EPIC 206215704 b was discovered by the undefined observatory using the transit method. Its semi-major axis is NaN astronomical units, as compared to Earth's which is 1 astronomical unit. The mass of EPIC 206215704 b is 0.6678 times the mass of Earth. The radius of EPIC 206215704 b is 0.9 that of Earth. At less than 1.5 Earth masses, EPIC 206215704 b is a regular terrestrial planet, much like the terrestrial planets we find in our solar system, namely Mercury, Venus, Earth and Mars.
description: 3D visualisation and gravity simulation of the exoplanet system EPIC 206215704, which contains undefined planets and was discovered by undefined.
